mil7.2.7:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil7.2.7:0.2_0: The account of the fault-finding mind
mil7.2.7:0.4_0: as well as an arched harp.
mil7.2.7:1.1_0: “A lonely enter one place and what you barber?”
mil7.2.7:1.2_0: “Sudinna, it’s possible to know or see or reach the end of the work.
mil7.2.7:1.3_0: In the same way, a disciple who goes on the Buddha’s instructions spoken by the Buddha, not taking care of what is allowable and proper for an ascetic.
mil7.2.7:1.4_0: This is how to barren field.
mil7.2.7:1.5_0: When I said this, great king, you are senior to say,
mil7.2.7:2.1_0: ‘With the word of the Buddha’s words,
mil7.2.7:2.4_0: after setting out to stand, to the highest goal.’”
mil7.2.7:3.1_0: an arched harp is of swift insight.
